Our lab are always recruiting M.Phil. or Ph.D students with strong academic background and/or solid programming skill. Before you apply, please first read the Application Guideline. For Chinese students, please refer to SIGMA Lab申请须知. You can contact Professor Wanli Ouyang through this email after you read the guidelines.

Currently, we have no position for postdoc researchers and research assistants for our lab.
